Class InventoryItem

java.lang.Object
edu.tamu.csce331.sharetea.models.InventoryItem
public class InventoryItem extends Object
Inventory item model representing stock items in the Sharetea POS system.

This class encapsulates inventory item information including stock levels, pricing, reorder points, and supplier details. Inventory items represent the raw materials and supplies used to prepare menu items and are essential for inventory management and cost tracking.

Key features:

  • Stock level tracking and management
  • Reorder point monitoring and alerts
  • Cost tracking and pricing management
  • Unit conversion and serving calculations
  • Supplier and receipt tracking

Inventory items support various unit types such as:

  • Weight-based units (kg, lbs, oz)
  • Volume-based units (liters, gallons, cups)
  • Count-based units (pieces, boxes, bags)
  • Custom units for specialty items
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • InventoryItem

      public InventoryItem()
      Default constructor for InventoryItem.

      Creates a new InventoryItem instance with default values. This constructor is typically used when creating new inventory items that will be populated with data from user input or database operations.

    • InventoryItem

      public InventoryItem(String sku, String name, String unit, BigDecimal onHandQuantity)
      Constructs an InventoryItem with specified basic information.

      This constructor is used when creating a new inventory item with known basic information. Default values are set for servings per unit and reorder point.

      Parameters:
      sku - the Stock Keeping Unit identifier
      name - the name of the inventory item
      unit - the unit of measurement
      onHandQuantity - the current quantity on hand
